slide.title: Controlling Options
slide.blurb: Options can be retrieved a number of ways

list.bullet: At runtime using %tidy_getopt()% or the %getopt()% method
Saving the configuration using %tidy_save_config()% or the %save_config()% method
Temporarily saving the configuration using %tidy_snapshot_config()% / %snapshot_config()% and restoring using %tidy_restore_config()% / %restore_config()%

slide.blurb: The configuration can also be reset to the default using %tidy_reset_config()% (uses %tidy.default_config%)
